TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SqlProcedureAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SqlProcedureAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SqlProcedureAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 用于将程序集中的方法定义标记为存储过程。

span.span: Used to mark a method definition in an assembly as a stored procedure.

summary.span: 该特性的属性反映了向 SQL Server 注册该类型时所使用的实体特征。

span.span: The properties on the attribute reflect the physical characteristics used when the type is registered with SQL Server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅由 Microsoft Visual Studio 用来自动将指定的方法注册为存储过程。 is used only by Microsoft Visual Studio to automatically register the specified method as a stored procedure. SQL Server 未使用此方法。It is not used by SQL Server. 有关 CLR 存储过程和示例的详细信息，请参阅 SQL Server 2005 联机丛书中的 "CLR 存储过程"。See "CLR Stored Procedures" in SQL Server 2005 Books Online for more information on CLR stored procedures and examples. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了已特性化为存储过程的程序集中的方法声明。The following example shows a method declaration in an assembly that has been attributed as a stored procedure. 该 属性已设置为存储过程的名称。The property has been set to the name of the stored procedure. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlProcedureAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlProcedureAttribute/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlProcedureAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlProcedureAttribute/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 程序集中的方法定义的特性，用于指示应将给定的方法注册为 SQL Server 中的存储过程。

span.span: An attribute on a method definition in an assembly, used to indicate that the given method should be registered as a stored procedure in SQL Server.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Name : string with get, set

span.span: The name of the stored procedure.
A representing the name of the stored procedure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是可选的。The property is optional. 下面的示例指定使用名称引用该存储过程 `sp_sqlName` 。The following example specifies that the stored procedure is referenced using the name `sp_sqlName`. ## Examples [!code-csharp[VbRaddataSQLObjects#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRaddataSQLObjects/CS/InsertCurrency.cs#7)] [!code-vb[VbRaddataSQLObjects#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRaddataSQLObjects/VB/InsertCurrency.vb#7)]
